22-1318.summary: Recommendation to adopt Utility Allowances for Affordable Rental Housing Programs, effective January 1, 2023.  (Citywide)Vice Mayor Richardson joined the meeting.A motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Vice Chair Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Allen, Supernaw, Mungo, Austin, Richardson, Saro, Zendejas and TanzerExcused: 1 - UrangaAbsent: 1 - Price5.

22-1320.summary: Recommendation to adopt resolution approving a revised Voucher Payment Standard Schedule for the Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher Program, effective January 1, 2023 for all zip code areas in Long Beach.  (Citywide)Councilwoman Mungo recused herself from Agenda Item No. 5.A motion was made by Vice Chair Saro, seconded by Commissioner Austin, to approve recommendation and adoptResolution No. H.A. 09-22.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Allen, Supernaw, Austin, Richardson, Saro, Zendejas and TanzerExcused: 1 - UrangaAbsent: 1 - PriceRecused: 1 - MungoEnactment No: H.A. 09-226.
